alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 11:52PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN MASON, ROBERTSON, EASTERN BRACKEN AND SOUTHERN BROWN COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM EDT... At 1151 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Brooksville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Washington, Ripley, Aberdeen, Augusta, Brooksville, Higginsport, Dover, Germantown, Minerva, Abigail, Redoak, Moranburg, Stonewall, Parina, Lowell, Somo, South Ripley, Chatham and Tuckahoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
